document.title: EiffelASP.NET Installation
document.paragraph:
EiffelASP.NET is available for downloading for free at
http://www.eiffel.com http://www.eiffel.com . Simply run the file and follow the installer instructions. It is recommended that Internet Information Services (IIS) be deployed on the machine prior to installing EiffelASP.NET. If IIS is not deployed then the installation program will display a warning message box. Click ignore to keep installing the product.
Without IIS, ASP.NET pages cannot be loaded and thus the samples will not be installed. It might still be useful to install EiffelASP.NET without IIS if the Eiffel CodeDom Provider is going to be used through other
scenarios ../codedom/scenarios.xml
. If IIS is available then the installer will open an Eiffel ASP.NET page at the end of the installation process. This page contains links to the documentation and samples. The installer will also put links to these documents in the Start menu under 'Programs\EiffelASP.NET x.x' where 'x.x' corresponds to the version number of EiffelASP.NET.
2System Requirements
Windows 2000 Server or Advanced Server with Service Pack 2, Windows XP Professional or 64-Bit Edition, or one of the Windows Server 2003 family products.
.NET Framework (1.0 or 1.1)
Internet Information Services with ASP.NET (optional see above)
2ASP.NET Installation
Please consult the corresponding documentation (available online at
http://msdn.microsoft.com/asp.net/ http://msdn.microsoft.com/asp.net/ _blank
) for configuring ASP.NET properly. In particular, be aware that by default ASP.NET is disabled on Windows 2003 Server.
